snippet.title: Torrente 3 The protector gameplay part 2/2 (PC) | No Commentary
snippet.description:
I showcase mobile games that can be played on PC, either through an emulator or official release. If you're interested in playing mobile games on the PC yourself, I would suggest installing Google Play Games Beta or looking for an official release of the desired game. https://play.google.com/googleplaygames 
If neither is an option, Bluestacks android emulator is the second best option
https://www.bluestacks.com

If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

Every game is separately playlisted on my channel.
https://www.youtube.com/@MindLessSaint

Games i have covered:
Raid: Shadow Legends
Idle Heroes
Call Of Dragons
Hero Wars: Alliance
Age of Frostfall
World War Armies
Echocalypse: Scarlet Covenant
Lords Mobile
State Of Survival
Doomsday: Last Survivors
Sea of Conquest
Stormshot Isle of Adventure
The Grand Mafia
Dragonheir: Silent Gods
Monster Legends
Guns of Glory: Lost Island
Viking Rise
Age Of Apes
Last Shelter: Survival

#mobilegames #androidgames #games
